description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join the elite combat team known as the Light Fighters in a variety of battle modes. Compete Head-To-Head in Multiplayer or try to save the Colony from impending doom. Prove your skills and valor by entering the Galactic Tournament where you will face the toughest foes in the Galaxy. Utilize special abilities to gain the upper hand in battle or relax to the interstellar tunes of the Galaxy Radio.
